text: 11|57|neohuiga geoyeoghayeodo naneun i mi neohuiege bonaeeojin malsseum-eul jeon haess-euni junimkkeseo neohui anin daleun baegseong-eulo hayeo neohuileul gyeseunghage halila geuleona neohuineun geubun-eul jo geumdo haehaji moshalini sillo geubun eun modeun geos-eul jugwanhasim-e jeonjijeon neunghasim-ila
